gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 112, Jazz 105
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Jazz, 112-105. Brandon Ingram recorded 26 points, five assists, and three rebounds for the Pelicans, with CJ McCollum adding 22 points and six assists in the victory. Collin Sexton tallied 26 points, five rebounds, and three assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 18-14 in the regular season, while the Jazz fall to 13-19.
